base_fields = {'description': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'duration': <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object>, 'feedback': <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>, 'feedback_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'name': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'registration_kinds': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'registration_kinds_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'registrations': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'registrations_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}¶
clean()¶

Check for conditional requirements: - Check if feedback has been filled out - If a registration which needs a kind has been checked, make sure the kind is selected - If a registration which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If a registration_kind which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If feedback is set to yes, make sure feedback_details has been filled out

declared_fields = {}¶
media¶

model¶

alias of tasks.models.Session

widgets = {'leader_has_coc': <django.forms.widgets.RadioSelect object>, 'setting': <django.forms.widgets.CheckboxSelectMultiple object>, 'supervision': <django.forms.widgets.RadioSelect object>}¶
base_fields = {'is_copy': <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>, 'leader_has_coc': <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>, 'parent_session': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'setting': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'setting_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'supervision': <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>, 'tasks_number': <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object>}¶
clean()¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If a setting which needs details or supervision has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If is_copy is True, parent_session is required - If is_copy is False, tasks_number is required

declared_fields = {'is_copy': <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>, 'parent_session': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>}¶

refresh_from_db(using=None, fields=None)¶
registrationkind_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

requires_review¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

task_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

pizza.toppings and topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class Child(Model):

pizza.toppings and topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class tasks.models.Session(id, setting_details, supervision, leader_has_coc, order, tasks_number, tasks_duration, study)¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

current_task()¶

Returns the current (incomplete) Task. - If all Tasks are completed, the last Task is returned. - If no Tasks have yet been created, None is returned.
